a:s.a:s:
/** * Numerator * * Definition: Number of people living with HIV diagnosed with HCV infection who have completed HCV treatment and had a sustained virological response (SVR). SVR is assessed by a viral load measurement 12–24 weeks after the end of treatment. * Calculation: COUNT of clients with "HIV status"='HIV-positive' with "HCV treatment completion date" in the reporting period AND with "HCV viral load test date" is BETWEEN '12, 24' weeks after "HCV treatment completion date" AND "HCV viral load test result"='Not detected' */
define "Numerator":
HE."HCV viral load test date D.DE178"

expression.name: HCV viral load test date D.DE178

a:s.a:s:
/** * Denominator * * Definition: Number of people living with HIV and co-infected with HCV who completed HCV treatment and were assessed for sustained virological response * Calculation: COUNT of clients with "HIV status"='HIV-positive' with "HCV treatment completion date" in the reporting period AND with "HCV viral load test date" is BETWEEN '12, 24' weeks after "HCV treatment completion date" */
define "Denominator":
HE."HCV viral load test date D.DE178"

expression.name: HCV viral load test date D.DE178
